participant_2.background:
Drawing in traditional style is my pasion.
My inspiration is classical music.
Someday i with to become a famous animator and work for a big company like dreamworks.
I am a graphic designer.
I have recently started working as a freelance designer.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
What are you passionate about?
I love drawing in a traditional style, inspired by classical music. I'd love to be a famous animator and work for a big company like Dreamworks!
That's great! I'm a big fan of animation. What kind of things do you like to draw?
I love drawing animals and characters, and I'm also really into fantasy art.
I love animals too! I have two dogs and a cat.
Aw, that's great! I have a little dog named Toby.
I love the name Toby! What's your favorite type of art to draw?
I think my favorite type of art to draw is characters. I love coming up with their personalities and stories.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been very good at drawing characters.
It takes a lot of practice, but it's really rewarding when you can finally draw a character that you're proud of.
I'm sure it does! I'm impressed by your skills.
Thank you!
What are your plans for the future?
I'm hoping to start working as a freelance graphic designer. I'm excited to see where my work takes me!
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll be successful.
Thank you! I appreciate that.
Well, I'm glad to have met you. I wish you all the best in your future endeavors!
Thank you! It was nice meeting you too.
